verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%>, brothers <S%G80><s%>, could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unto spiritual <S%G4152><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unto carnal <S%G4559><s%>, even as <S%G5613><s%> unto babes <S%G3516><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

I have fed <S%G4222><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with milk <S%G1051><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with food <S%G1033><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> until now <S%G3768><s%> you were not able <S%G1410><s%> to bear it <S%G235><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> are you able <S%G1410><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> carnal <S%G4559><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> since <S%G3699><s%> there is among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> envying <S%G2205><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> strife <S%G2054><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> divisions <S%G1370><s%>, are you <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> carnal <S%G4559><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> men <S%G444><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> while <S%G3752><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> says <S%G3004><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G99999><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> of Paul <S%G3972><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am of Apollos <S%G625><s%>; are you <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> carnal <S%G4559><s%>?

Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is Apollos <S%G625><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> <S%G99999><s%> ministers <S%G1249><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you believed <S%G4100><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> gave to <S%G1325><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%>?
I <S%G1473><s%> have planted <S%G5452><s%>, Apollos <S%G625><s%> watered <S%G4222><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave the increase <S%G837><s%>.

So then <S%G5620><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> is he <S%G2076><s%> that plants <S%G5452><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> he that waters <S%G4222><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> that gives the increase <S%G837><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> plants <S%G5452><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> waters <S%G4222><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> shall receive <S%G2983><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> labor <S%G2873><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> laborers together <S%G4904><s%> with God <S%G2316><s%>: you are <S%G2075><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s husbandry <S%G1091><s%>, you are God <S%G2316><s%>'s building <S%G3619><s%>.

According to <S%G2596><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> a wise <S%G4680><s%> masterbuilder <S%G753><s%>, I have laid <S%G5087><s%> the foundation <S%G2310><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> another <S%G243><s%> builds on it <S%G2026><s%>. But <S%G1161><s%> let <S%G991><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> take care <S%G991><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he builds <S%G2026><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> no other <S%G243><s%> foundation <S%G2310><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> lay <S%G5087><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> what was laid <S%G2749><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> builds <S%G2026><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> foundation <S%G2310><s%> gold <S%G5557><s%>, silver <S%G696><s%>, precious <S%G5093><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%>, wood <S%G3586><s%>, hay <S%G5528><s%>, stubble <S%G2562><s%>;

Every man <S%G1538><s%>'s work <S%G2041><s%> shall be made <S%G1096><s%> manifest <S%G5318><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> shall declare it <S%G1213><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> it shall be revealed <S%G601><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the fire <S%G4442><s%> shall test <S%G1381><s%> each man <S%G1538><s%>'s work <S%G2041><s%> to see what sort <S%G3697><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%>.
If <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%>'s work <S%G2041><s%> remains <S%G3306><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> he has built on it <S%G2026><s%>, he shall receive <S%G2983><s%> a reward <S%G3306><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%>'s work <S%G2041><s%> shall be burned <S%G2618><s%>, he shall suffer loss <S%G2210><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> shall be saved <S%G4982><s%>; yet <S%G1161><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>.

Know you <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> dwells <S%G3611><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>?

If <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> defiles <S%G5351><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, him <S%G5126><s%> shall <S%G5351><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> destroy <S%G5351><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> holy <S%G40><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%>.

Let <S%G1818><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G1818><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>. If <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> seems <S%G1380><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> world <S%G165><s%>, let him become <S%G1096><s%> a fool <S%G3474><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he may be <S%G1096><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> foolishness <S%G3472><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, He takes <S%G1405><s%> the wise <S%G4680><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their own <S%G846><s%> craftiness <S%G3834><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, The Lord <S%G2962><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> the thoughts <S%G1261><s%> of the wise <S%G4680><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> vain <S%G3152><s%>.
Therefore <S%G5620><s%> let <S%G2744><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> men <S%G444><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> yours <S%G5216><s%>;

Whether <S%G1535><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> Cephas <S%G2786><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> things present <S%G1764><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> things to come <S%G3195><s%>; all <S%G3956><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> yours <S%G5216><s%>;
And <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> are Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s; and <S%G1161><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is God <S%G2316><s%>'s.
